tooltip.rechantment.enchantment_table.en: A book with mysterious spirit, concealed occult magic inside
tooltip.rechantment.enchantment_table.ri: Right click to return to main enchanter screen
message.rechantment.insufficient_books: You only have %d/%d of the required bookshelves in range!
message.rechantment.insufficient_floor: You only have %d/%d of the required %s floor!
message.rechantment.inventory_full: You do not have enough space in your inventory for a book!
creative.rechantment.title: Rechantment
item.rechantment.chance_gem.description: Randomizes the success rate on an enchanted book.
item.rechantment.return_gem.description: Safely teleport to your current respawn point.
enchantment.rechantment.thunder_strike.d: Chance to summon lightning to strike your targets.
enchantment.rechantment.bash.description: Knocks an attacker back if blocking.
enchantment.rechantment.courage.descript: Gain a burst of speed on a successful block.
enchantment.rechantment.voids_bane.descr: Greatly increases damage to mobs while in the End.
enchantment.rechantment.hells_fury.descr: Greatly increases damage to mobs while in the Nether.
enchantment.rechantment.ice_aspect.descr: Targets will be slowed for a short period when attacked.
enchantment.rechantment.wisdom.descripti: Increased EXP drops from mined ores.
enchantment.rechantment.inquisitive.desc: Increased EXP drops from killed mobs.
enchantment.rechantment.berserk.descript: When reaching low health, will cause the weapon to deal increased damage for a duration.
enchantment.rechantment.blitz.descriptio: Land many rapid hits to build an escalating combo of increased damage.
enchantment.rechantment.telepathy.descri: Item drops teleport directly to your inventory.
enchantment.rechantment.timber.descripti: Harvest the entire tree when breaking logs.
enchantment.rechantment.rebirth.descript: Chance to bring your item back from death.
enchantment.rechantment.reborn.descripti: Prevents an item from being reborn again.
enchantment.rechantment.spring.descripti: Sneak for a short time to charge a powerful jump.
enchantment.rechantment.volley.descripti: Chance to shoot multiple arrows with each shot.
enchantment.minecraft.protection.descrip: Reduces most types of damage by increasing amounts.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces damage and burn time when lit on fire.
enchantment.minecraft.feather_falling.de: Reduces the damage dealt from falling.
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Reduces the damage and knockback of explosions.
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Reduces the damage dealt from projectiles.
enchantment.minecraft.respiration.descri: Extends the breathing time while submerged underwater.
enchantment.minecraft.aqua_affinity.desc: Increases mining speed while submerged underwater.
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.description: Reflects the damage taken when hit, at the cost of durability.
enchantment.minecraft.depth_strider.desc: Increases movement speed while submerged underwater.
enchantment.minecraft.frost_walker.descr: Changes the water blocks beneath the player into frosted ice.
enchantment.minecraft.binding_curse.desc: Armor cannot be removed from unless the cause is death or breaking.
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.descrip: Increases the walking speed on soul sand and soul soil.
enchantment.minecraft.sharpness.descript: Increases the damage dealt from weapons.
enchantment.minecraft.smite.description: Increases the damage dealt to undead mobs.
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Increases damage and applies Slowness IV to arthropod mobs.
enchantment.minecraft.knockback.descript: Knocks mobs away from you when hit.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_aspect.descri: Lights a target on fire when hit.
enchantment.minecraft.looting.descriptio: Increases the amount of loot dropped by mobs.
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping.descripti: Increases the damage done from sweeping attacks.
enchantment.minecraft.efficiency.descrip: Increases the mining speed of tools.
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.descrip: Mined blocks will drop as blocks instead of dropping their loot.
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.descrip: Increases the durability of the item.
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.descriptio: Increases the drop chances of certain blocks.
enchantment.minecraft.power.description: Increases the damage dealt from arrows.
enchantment.minecraft.punch.description: Increases the knockback power of arrows.
enchantment.minecraft.flame.description: Arrows set light a target on fire when hit.
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.descripti: Shooting with projectiles does not consume arrows.
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Increases the rate of rare loot from fishing.
enchantment.minecraft.lure.description: Decreases the wait time until fish bites.
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.descripti: Deals additional damage to mobs that spawn naturally in the ocean.
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.descriptio: Launches player with a Trident when thrown, but only in rain or water.
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.descrip: Channels a bolt of lightning toward a target hit during a thunderstorm.
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.descript: Shoot three arrows at the cost of one, but only one can be recovered.
enchantment.minecraft.quick_charge.descr: Decreases the charging time of crossbows.
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.descripti: Arrows can pass through multiple entities.
enchantment.minecraft.mending.descriptio: Repairs the item when gaining XP orbs.
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: Item is forever destroyed upon death.
sounds.rechantment.enchanted_book_fail: Book failed to enchant item sound
